ygData.subject: Re: Corpse
ygData.msgSnippet: You must retrieve your corpse because all of your equipment remains on it if you die. If you are to slow the corpse will decay (At level 5 you get about a week
ygData.messageBody:
You must retrieve your corpse because all of your
equipment remains on it if you die. If you are to slow the
corpse will decay (At level 5 you get about a week to
recover it, no biggie.) It is one of the most boring and
frustrating parts of the game, but it is more realistc
=)<br><br>Emotes that have animations are wave, cheer, cry, frown
(Just like cry), and rude gesture (Everybody's favorite
LOL). I believe that is all there is now, but
supposedly 20+ new ones will be coming eventually.
